_aChangeLog.text: Fixed lasergun so it only damages the zombies.
Fixed all safe spots on dimensional.
Increased turret damage. Instant kill to humans.
Added a new teleport system. People have to go to 2 safe zones where the people present will be teleported. One zone has 50/50 chance of teleporting.
Removed old teleporting system for humans. More ZE Dominant system is added. No need to whine more.
People who don't reach the safe zones will meet an inevitable end.
Hell from v1 is added back :)
Speed of RNG on MYSTIC is reduced on one segment. Fixed a safe spot.
Teleporter item abuse glitch is permanently fixed. Sorry 21Pika.
2nd RNG segment on DIMENSIONAL is buffed a little bit.

_sText:
**This is an improved version of the beta version of this Map ze_eerie_escape_b1**

Map Contains:

7 Stages + Zombie Mode. (7 Total)
Stage-1: STATIC
Stage-2: SONIC
Stage-3: HYPER
Stage-4: ULTIMATE
Stage-5: CORRUPTED
Stage-6: DIMENSIONAL
Map Also Contains Items (6 for Humans, 3 for Zombies)

Human Items

  • Tecquila Shotgun
  • EERIE Shield
  • Teleporter
  • JetPack.

Zombie Items
  • Zombie Killer
  • Zombie Invisibility
  • Zombie Laser

Map Info: 
On First 7 Stages, Humans have to survive 100 seconds, then they will be teleported to final destination and dodge the Lasers. (5 Stages contains Lasers and 6th has Cube RNG). Overall Map is made for fun and doesn't contain any real tryhard.

NOTE
**If Map contains bugs, just inform me. You are not allowed to edit and re-upload this map.**

** Map Ideas from NemesisNiDE Laser,Mako Reactor, Luccidreams. **
** Special Thanks to Hobbitten for motivating/bug fixes/cfgs. **
** Map Tester: HA **

Final Update
v3 will be the final version and this map will have no more updates. It was a small prototype map made for fun. And I'm planning to move on and work on my bigger projects.
Edit: Reason for v3_5? People wanted a new version.

--------- ze_eerie_escape_v4_1 --------- 
Increased Laser Item CD.
Jetpack TP issue is solved.
Now a teleporter will spawn instead of getting teleported in houses.

--------- ze_eerie_escape_v4_2 --------- 
Fixed Lasergun so it only damages the zombies.
Fixed some minor issues.
Increased ZM Invisibility time.

--------- ze_eerie_escape_v3 Reversal--------- 

Map is reversed to eerie_v3 which was the stable version of this eerie escape. Will upload ze_eerie_escape_redux_final, which will be entirely new eerie escape. 
Reason: v4 broke the map by mapping perspective as well as for the gameplay.
